::Zardus::

A blast door slides aside, allowing Zardus exit from the section of 
the Alliance base he was in. He flies up to Dark Angel, looking at 
the bot.

"What did you need to speak to me about?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Rummaging through crates, Zardus recieves Dark Angel's 
transmission, 
> finally finding the bot he had been loking for.
> 
> He stands up, activating his comm.
> 
> "I'll be out to speak shortly," he says, slinging the bot he had 
> gotten over his shoulder and walking off toward the exit. THe bot 
> over his shoulder was covered in a black sheet, the face and the 
body 
> not visble through the cover.
